description: Student debt for borrowers from over 150 schools will be canceled, including from DeVry University and University of Phoenix.
title: The Department of Education agreed to wipe out $6 billion in student loan debt — find out if you qualify
content: The Department of Education agreed on June 23 to cancel the student loan debt of about 200,000 borrowers, wiping out about $6 billion in total debt. More than 60,000 additional borrowers may also see… [+7254 chars]
